body.p:
Rock Castle Ky Novr 29th ^1864^
To his Excellency
Gov Bramlett of Ky
Sir

I herewith tender to you my resignation of Office as Justice of the Peace in the 2nd District of Trigg County Ky, & recommend the Appointment of G. B. Grasty, of this District, to fill the unexpired term, in my Place
I resign in consequence of Rheumatis which render me unfit to attend to the Duties of Office, it being located Particularly Severe in my Pen Hand.

Should you appoint Mr Grasty it would be a considerable accomodation to the citizens of this District that he receive his com ^for this Dist, ^ Early as the term of Court comes on in next month
You will address Mr Grasty, if favored at this Office

Yours Respectfully
Bazzel Standrod
for D. W. Standrod

Trigg County
Justice Peace
Resignation of B. Standrod & appt of G B Grasty
3rd Dec/64
